# About the Author {.unnumbered}

**Moody Amakobe** is a multidisciplinary researcher, data scientist, and  
blockchain architect with expertise spanning artificial intelligence,  
computational systems, data engineering, and complex distributed architectures.  

He is the founder of the **Global Data Science Institute (GDSI)**, where he  
leads innovation across data science, deep learning, algorithm design, and  
technology-for-impact initiatives.  

Moody has taught at multiple universities, authored technology textbooks,  
advised research teams, supervised graduate projects, and built industry  
solutions used across healthcare, finance, agriculture, and public systems.  

His work focuses on designing **beautifully efficient algorithms**,  
**real-world AI systems**, and **scalable technologies** that solve  
societal challenges.
